entry.value: country, source_system, Bucket_Name, Flow_Name, log-stage, deploy_id,deploy_result, deploy_pg_id, log-level, request_id, Flow.Error
Flow deployment failed with message ${parsed.1:contains('Read timed out'):ifElse(${parsed.1:trim():append('. \nPlease setup the variables manually')},${parsed.1:trim()})}

Flow name ${Flow_Name} with PG ID ${parsed.1:substringAfterLast('is'):trim()} has been deployed successfully in ${nifi_id}. Deployed URL : ${nifi_id}nifi/?processGroupId=${parsed.1:substringAfterLast('is'):trim()}

entry.value:
import traceback from org.apache.nifi.processors.script import ExecuteScript from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback from java.io import BufferedReader, InputStreamReader, OutputStreamWriter import re
class ConvertFiles(StreamCallback) : def __init__(self,col_list,country_code) : self.col_list=col_list self.country_code=country_code self.source_system='' pass def process(self, inputStream, outputStream) : try : reader = InputStreamReader(inputStream,"UTF-8") bufferedReader = BufferedReader(reader) writer = OutputStreamWriter(outputStream,"UTF-8") line = bufferedReader.readLine() while line != None: ChangedRec = line.upper() Words = ChangedRec.split("|") if len(Words[1]) !=0: for idx,value in enumerate(Words): if str(idx) in self.col_list: if str(idx)==(self.col_list)[0]: writer.write(self.country_code+'|'+value.strip()) self.source_system=value.strip() else: writer.write('|') writer.write(value.strip()) writer.write('\n') line = bufferedReader.readLine() writer.flush() writer.close() reader.close() bufferedReader.close() except : print "Exception in Reader:" print '-' * 60 traceback.print_exc(file=sys.stdout) print '-' * 60 raise session.transfer(flowFile, ExecuteScript.REL_FAILURE) finally : if bufferedReader is not None : bufferedReader.close() if reader is not None : reader.close() flowFile = session.get() if flowFile is not None : col_list = flowFile.getAttribute('col_list').split(',') country_code = flowFile.getAttribute('country_code') disp = flowFile.getAttribute('Content-Disposition') file_name=disp.split(';')[1].split('=')[1].replace('"','') ConvertFilesData = ConvertFiles(col_list,country_code) session.write(flowFile, ConvertFilesData) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'filename', file_name) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'source_system', ConvertFilesData.source_system) session.transfer(flowFile, ExecuteScript.REL_SUCCESS)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS global_dd_db.data_element(`country` string,`source_system` string,`source_table` string,`element_column_name` string,`data_type` string,`length` string,`precision` string,`scale` string,`mandatory` string,`system_definition` string,`data_classification` string,`data_category` string,`pk_flag` string,`value_definition` string,`not_in_use` string) ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY '|' LOCATION '/global/data_dict/hive/data_element';

config.annotationData: <criteria> <flowFilePolicy>USE_ORIGINAL</flowFilePolicy> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_ingest</attribute> <id>395ab9e9-8220-4bc4-9d0e-eee7b544db2e</id> <value>Invalid Ingestion Type</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${ingestion_type:notNull()}</expression> <id>823741fb-17e5-4145-b688-bb0191ccb774</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${ingest_type:toUpper():in("FI","CDC","REAL-TIME"):not()}</expression> <id>32f3ab0e-3050-41a6-8d1a-7cf64a6db787</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${framework:equalsIgnoreCase("CURATION"):not()}</expression> <id>ab57f155-a029-421b-b3ad-eabc260605e6</id> </conditions> <id>7c45f437-436c-4879-b22f-19b468facb76</id> <name>Validate_Ingest_Type</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_ingest</attribute> <id>0ade1ef9-7727-4401-b764-da3c90657055</id> <value>Ingest_type is not required for Curation Framework</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${framework:equalsIgnoreCase("CURATION")}</expression> <id>7ead0c06-ff59-4f5f-bf5c-5a779945b9a5</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${ingest_type:notNull()}</expression> <id>ed0dabc6-c139-478b-af12-d008058a3c33</id> </conditions> <id>bb8e8e07-a6f1-4b84-8695-99fc91147de7</id> <name>Validate_Ingest_Curation</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_dd_ingestion</attribute> <id>1cdbd08f-0ba0-4054-b721-62ca4e4825a9</id> <value>Invalid DD Ingestion Value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${dd_ingestion:toUpper():in("TRUE","FALSE"):not()}</expression> <id>78e6324e-fecf-46fc-a1be-5c1263efc4df</id> </conditions> <id>c35bd2bf-7e8c-4713-98bd-7604bf122608</id> <name>Validate_DD_Ingestion</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_dd_url</attribute> <id>c1560d30-dcfa-4d22-b2a2-f997aab898a9</id> <value>DD_URL can not be emtpy when DD_INGESTION is set to TRUE</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${dd_ingestion:equalsIgnoreCase('TRUE')}</expression> <id>fad8af75-29be-49ef-9c0d-2c44a75302b0</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${dd_url:isNull()}</expression> <id>395aff88-0434-4c1b-a931-7def4c7faef5</id> </conditions> <id>d3c936b5-7654-44fa-8f51-64dbfda1b845</id> <name>Validate_DD_Url</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_create</attribute> <id>7173054d-288f-499b-b9f2-7cbf97194230</id> <value>Invalid CreateDB value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${create_db:notNull()}</expression> <id>34d7f734-f4f2-42e3-873f-632b43773e8b</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${create_db:toUpper():in('CREATEONLY', 'DROPCREATE'):not()}</expression> <id>54ad8574-1c93-4046-be3d-d79f5175e828</id> </conditions> <id>330e5d1d-0a03-4a00-b6eb-05ed1e20fd6b</id> <name>Validate_Create_DB</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_country</attribute> <id>1bcd9c5e-f57e-4a75-a141-61d42d7fd55b</id> <value>Invalid Country value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${country:toUpper():in("HK","VN","JP","SG","ID","KH","PH","MY","MM","REGIONAL","CI"):not()}</expression> <id>ac41f5bd-26df-4666-80dc-799b60961957</id> </conditions> <id>4cc71d4d-6f8b-488d-ae0c-3228074a96b4</id> <name>Validate_Country</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_env</attribute> <id>17695612-6aaf-4cb0-a099-cffd56370b4d</id> <value>Invalid Env value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${env:toUpper():in("DEV", "SIT", "UAT", "PROD"):not()}</expression> <id>fa1095a7-1678-4f61-85ea-2fad19467734</id> </conditions> <id>2f75cf22-81ac-4831-9a45-bffd5e228bb2</id> <name>Validate_Env</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_framework</attribute> <id>7bb47a12-3c18-4477-9b78-613a57073f8d</id> <value>Invalid Framework value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${framework:toUpper():in("IF1", "IF2", "IF1->2", "ARCHIVAL", "KAFKA2EDL", "KAFKA2HBASE", "SOURCETOSFDC", "CURATION", "CUSTOMIZED"):not()}</expression> <id>96003698-09a6-4ca0-8bdd-be810a95a4a9</id> </conditions> <id>1b016e3a-ab70-40fe-9617-985aedd5a716</id> <name>Validate_Framework</name> </rules> </criteria>

Drop will not proceed.</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${chk_published_actual:equalsIgnoreCase(${actual_published_location}):not()}</expression> <id>c30b95f2-b3e7-4f52-ba8d-9583442e7639</id> </conditions> <id>12181bb0-efb5-4069-a4f3-a16eccc9907b</id> <name>Validat_Actual_Published_Location</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_actual_cdc_location</attribute> <id>9c0ca0c9-61dd-41d9-bcb6-ff68ba6428d2</id> <value>Incorrect current CDC DB location. Drop will not proceed.</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${chk_incr_actual:equalsIgnoreCase(${actual_incr_location}):not()}</expression> <id>0e677eec-ecf5-4708-ace1-fa6a3c8e8a35</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${cdc_schema:notNull()}</expression> <id>b9824e14-7e0e-4d33-8e97-f181201d07f5</id> </conditions> <id>08934b46-ff8a-4a38-8fec-8e91d97a2368</id> <name>Validate_Actual_INCR_Location</name> </rules> </criteria>

import traceback from org.apache.nifi.processors.script import ExecuteScript from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback from java.io import BufferedReader, InputStreamReader, OutputStreamWriter import re
class ConvertFiles(StreamCallback) : def __init__(self,col_list,country_code) : self.col_list=col_list self.country_code=country_code self.source_system='' pass def process(self, inputStream, outputStream) : try : reader = InputStreamReader(inputStream,"UTF-8") bufferedReader = BufferedReader(reader) writer = OutputStreamWriter(outputStream,"UTF-8") line = bufferedReader.readLine() while line != None: ChangedRec = line.upper() Words = ChangedRec.split("|") if len(Words[1]) !=0: for idx,value in enumerate(Words): if str(idx) in self.col_list: if str(idx)==(self.col_list)[0]: writer.write(self.country_code+'|'+value.strip()) self.source_system=value.strip() else: writer.write('|') writer.write(value.strip()) writer.write('\n') line = bufferedReader.readLine() writer.flush() writer.close() reader.close() bufferedReader.close() except : print "Exception in Reader:" print '-' * 60 traceback.print_exc(file=sys.stdout) print '-' * 60 raise session.transfer(flowFile, ExecuteScript.REL_FAILURE) finally : if bufferedReader is not None : bufferedReader.close() if reader is not None : reader.close() flowFile = session.get() if flowFile is not None : col_list = flowFile.getAttribute('col_list').split(',') country_code = flowFile.getAttribute('country_code') disp = flowFile.getAttribute('Content-Disposition') file_name=disp.split(';')[1].split('=')[1].replace('"','') ConvertFilesData = ConvertFiles(col_list,country_code) session.write(flowFile, ConvertFilesData) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'filename', file_name) flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, 'source_system', ConvertFilesData.source_system) session.transfer(flowFile, ExecuteScript.REL_SUCCESS)

Framework</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${framework:equalsIgnoreCase("CURATION")}</expression> <id>7ead0c06-ff59-4f5f-bf5c-5a779945b9a5</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${ingest_type:notNull()}</expression> <id>ed0dabc6-c139-478b-af12-d008058a3c33</id> </conditions> <id>bb8e8e07-a6f1-4b84-8695-99fc91147de7</id> <name>Validate_Ingest_Curation</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_dd_ingestion</attribute> <id>1cdbd08f-0ba0-4054-b721-62ca4e4825a9</id> <value>Invalid DD Ingestion Value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${dd_ingestion:toUpper():in("TRUE","FALSE"):not()}</expression> <id>78e6324e-fecf-46fc-a1be-5c1263efc4df</id> </conditions> <id>c35bd2bf-7e8c-4713-98bd-7604bf122608</id> <name>Validate_DD_Ingestion</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_dd_url</attribute> <id>c1560d30-dcfa-4d22-b2a2-f997aab898a9</id> <value>DD_URL can not be emtpy when DD_INGESTION is set to TRUE</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${dd_ingestion:equalsIgnoreCase('TRUE')}</expression> <id>fad8af75-29be-49ef-9c0d-2c44a75302b0</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${dd_url:isNull()}</expression> <id>395aff88-0434-4c1b-a931-7def4c7faef5</id> </conditions> <id>d3c936b5-7654-44fa-8f51-64dbfda1b845</id> <name>Validate_DD_Url</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_create</attribute> <id>7173054d-288f-499b-b9f2-7cbf97194230</id> <value>Invalid CreateDB value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${create_db:notNull()}</expression> <id>34d7f734-f4f2-42e3-873f-632b43773e8b</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${create_db:toUpper():in('CREATEONLY', 'DROPCREATE'):not()}</expression> <id>54ad8574-1c93-4046-be3d-d79f5175e828</id> </conditions> <id>330e5d1d-0a03-4a00-b6eb-05ed1e20fd6b</id> <name>Validate_Create_DB</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_country</attribute> <id>1bcd9c5e-f57e-4a75-a141-61d42d7fd55b</id> <value>Invalid Country value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${country:toUpper():in("HK","VN","JP","SG","ID","KH","PH","MY","MM","REGIONAL","CI"):not()}</expression> <id>ac41f5bd-26df-4666-80dc-799b60961957</id> </conditions> <id>4cc71d4d-6f8b-488d-ae0c-3228074a96b4</id> <name>Validate_Country</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_env</attribute> <id>17695612-6aaf-4cb0-a099-cffd56370b4d</id> <value>Invalid Env value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${env:toUpper():in("DEV", "SIT", "UAT", "PROD"):not()}</expression> <id>fa1095a7-1678-4f61-85ea-2fad19467734</id> </conditions> <id>2f75cf22-81ac-4831-9a45-bffd5e228bb2</id> <name>Validate_Env</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>val_framework</attribute> <id>7bb47a12-3c18-4477-9b78-613a57073f8d</id> <value>Invalid Framework value</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${framework:toUpper():in("IF1", "IF2", "IF1->2", "ARCHIVAL", "KAFKA2EDL", "KAFKA2HBASE", "SOURCETOSFDC", "CURATION", "CUSTOMIZED"):not()}</expression> <id>96003698-09a6-4ca0-8bdd-be810a95a4a9</id> </conditions> <id>1b016e3a-ab70-40fe-9617-985aedd5a716</id> <name>Validate_Framework</name> </rules> </criteria>

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE hive_cicd_dev.test2 as select deploy_id, env, request_id, nifi_if, reg_bucket, reg_flow, reg_version, deploy_pg_id, config_url, var_json, start_log, finish_log, deploy_url, deploy_result, trigger_usr from hive_cicd_dev.hive_cicd_deployment_tst1 STORED AS TEXTFILE LOCATION '/cicd/hive_cicd_dev/test2'
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ci_published_cicd_dev_db.test_table1 (YEAR DECIMAL(4),MONTH VARCHAR(10)) STORED AS ORC;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hive_cicd_dev.hive_cicd_deployment (key int, deploy_id VARCHAR(255), env VARCHAR(10), request_id VARCHAR(255), nifi_id VARCHAR(10), reg_bucket VARCHAR(255), reg_flow VARCHAR(255), reg_version VARCHAR(5), deploy_pg_id VARCHAR(255), config_url VARCHAR(2048), var_json VARCHAR(65535), start_log TIMESTAMP, finish_log TIMESTAMP, deploy_url VARCHAR(2048), deploy_result VARCHAR(255), trigger_usr VARCHAR(255)) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key, dep:deploy_id, dep:env, dep:request_id, dep:nifi_id, dep:reg_bucket, dep:reg_flow, dep:reg_version, dep:deploy_pg_id, dep:config_url, dep:var_json, dep:start_log, dep:finish_log, dep:deploy_url, dep:deploy_result, dep:trigger_usr") TBLPROPERTIES ("hbase.table.name" = "hbase_cicd_deployment");

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hive_cicd_dev.hive_cicd_deployment_tst1 ( deploy_id VARCHAR(255), env VARCHAR(10), request_id VARCHAR(255), nifi_id VARCHAR(10), reg_bucket VARCHAR(255), reg_flow VARCHAR(255), reg_version VARCHAR(5), deploy_pg_id VARCHAR(255), config_url VARCHAR(2048), var_json VARCHAR(65535), start_log TIMESTAMP, finish_log TIMESTAMP, deploy_url VARCHAR(2048), deploy_result VARCHAR(255), trigger_usr VARCHAR(255)) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key, dept1:env, dept1:request_id, dept1:nifi_id, dept1:reg_bucket, dept1:reg_flow, dept1:reg_version, dept1:deploy_pg_id, dept1:config_url, dept1:var_json, dept1:start_log, dept1:finish_log, dept1:deploy_url, dept1:deploy_result, dept1:trigger_usr") TBLPROPERTIES ("hbase.table.name" = "cicd_dev:hbase_cicd_deployment_tst1");

entry.value: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hive_cicd_dev.hive_cicd_inventory (key int, log_prefix VARCHAR(20), pg_name VARCHAR(255), country VARCHAR(10), src_sys VARCHAR(255), developer VARCHAR(255), prod VARCHAR(1), data_src VARCHAR(255), data_dst VARCHAR(255), sys_desc VARCHAR(255), framework VARCHAR(255), ingest_type VARCHAR(255), splunk_url VARCHAR(2048), dev_nifi_url VARCHAR(2048), dd_url VARCHAR(2048), db_script VARCHAR(65535), trigger_sch VARCHAR(255), imp_steps VARCHAR(2048), create_log TIMESTAMP, update_log TIMESTAMP) STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ("hbase.columns.mapping" = ":key, inv:log_prefix, inv:pg_name, inv:country, inv:src_sys, inv:developer, inv:prod, inv:data_src, inv:data_dst, inv:sys_desc, inv:framework, inv:ingest_type, inv:splunk_url, inv:dev_nifi_url, inv:dd_url, inv:db_script, inv:trigger_sch, inv:imp_steps, inv:create_log, inv:update_log") TBLPROPERTIES ("hbase.table.name" = "hbase_cicd_inventory");
drop table if exists hive_cicd_dev.hive_cicd_inventory_tst; drop table if exists hive_cicd_dev.hive_cicd_deployment_tst;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS hive_cicd_dev.test1 ( deploy_id VARCHAR(255), env VARCHAR(10), request_id VARCHAR(255), nifi_id VARCHAR(10), reg_bucket VARCHAR(255), reg_flow VARCHAR(255), reg_version VARCHAR(5), deploy_pg_id VARCHAR(255), config_url VARCHAR(2048), var_json VARCHAR(65535), start_log TIMESTAMP, finish_log TIMESTAMP, deploy_url VARCHAR(2048), deploy_result VARCHAR(255), trigger_usr VARCHAR(255)) STORED AS TEXTFILE LOCATION '/cicd/hive_cicd_dev/test';
create database if not exists hive_cicd_dev location '/cicd/hive_cicd_dev';
